description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nSpooky Technique:
After your creatures {ACTION_attack} or {ACTION_cast} a spell that removes their {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE} buff, they deal damage to all enemies equal to 35% of their {STAT_defense}. This trait does not stack.
name: Spooky Pumpkin
